component-parameters.label: Survey Line
component-parameters.name: survey-line
component-parameters.helperText: Enter the survey line number or identifier

component-parameters.label: Start GPS Location
component-parameters.name: start-gps
component-parameters.helperText: Capture GPS location at transect start

component-parameters.label: End GPS Location
component-parameters.name: end-gps
component-parameters.helperText: Capture GPS location at transect end

component-parameters.label: Total Transect Width (m)
component-parameters.name: total-transect-width
component-parameters.helperText: Total width of the transect in meters

component-parameters.label: Number of Walkers
component-parameters.name: number-of-walkers
component-parameters.helperText: Number of people walking the transect

component-parameters.label: Participants
component-parameters.name: participants
component-parameters.helperText: List all participants in the transect survey

component-parameters.label: Photo File Numbers
component-parameters.name: photo-file-numbers
component-parameters.helperText: List camera ID and photo numbers taken of this transect

component-parameters.label: Remarks on Landform
component-parameters.name: landform-remarks
component-parameters.helperText: Comments such as: degrees of slope angles, incised stream valleys, size of landform, geological characteristics

component-parameters.label: Average Surface Visibility (%)
component-parameters.name: surface-visibility
component-parameters.helperText: Visibility determined to nearest 10%, accounting for grass cover, leaf litter, etc.

component-parameters.label: Remarks on Visibility
component-parameters.name: visibility-remarks
component-parameters.helperText: Comments such as: open patches, field, short or tall grass, trees, buildings, water surface

component-parameters.label: Average Artefact Exposure (%)
component-parameters.name: artefact-exposure
component-parameters.helperText: Mean percentage where erosion was sufficient to reveal objects on surface

component-parameters.label: Remarks on Exposure
component-parameters.name: exposure-remarks
component-parameters.helperText: Comments on erosion causes: agricultural activity, grazing, road disturbance, etc.

component-parameters.label: Estimated Cobbles per m²
component-parameters.name: cobbles-per-m2
component-parameters.helperText: Estimate the number of cobbles per square meter

component-parameters.label: Other Remarks on Cobbles
component-parameters.name: cobble-remarks
component-parameters.helperText: Additional comments about cobble distribution or characteristics

component-parameters.label: Sediment Size
component-parameters.name: sediment-size
component-parameters.helperText: Select all sediment sizes that apply

component-parameters.label: Other Remarks on Transect
component-parameters.name: transect-remarks
component-parameters.helperText: Any other comments on the transect recording

component-parameters.label: Transect Photo
component-parameters.name: transect-photo
component-parameters.helperText: Take photos of the transect area

component-parameters.label: GPS Location
component-parameters.name: poi-gps
component-parameters.helperText: Capture GPS location of this POI

component-parameters.label: Abundance of Flaws (%)
component-parameters.name: abundance-of-flaws
component-parameters.helperText: Percentage of impurities, mottles, large coarse fragments, and natural fissures

component-parameters.label: Photo File Numbers
component-parameters.name: poi-photo-numbers
component-parameters.helperText: List camera ID and photo numbers

component-parameters.label: Other Comments
component-parameters.name: poi-comments
component-parameters.helperText: Any additional comments about this POI

component-parameters.label: Completeness
component-parameters.name: core-completeness
component-parameters.helperText: Is the core complete or broken?

component-parameters.label: Outer Surface (Cortex) on Whole Core
component-parameters.name: cortex-whole-core
component-parameters.helperText: Percentage of cortex on whole core

component-parameters.label: Outer Surface on Upper Hemisphere
component-parameters.name: cortex-upper-hemisphere
component-parameters.helperText: Face with the lowest amount of cortex

component-parameters.label: Outer Surface on Lower Hemisphere
component-parameters.name: cortex-lower-hemisphere
component-parameters.helperText: Face with the highest amount of cortex

component-parameters.label: Number of Flake Scars
component-parameters.name: number-flake-scars
component-parameters.helperText: All scars ≥ 10 mm in length and width

component-parameters.label: GPS Location
component-parameters.name: artefact-gps
component-parameters.helperText: Capture GPS location of this artefact

component-parameters.label: Maximum Dimension (mm)
component-parameters.name: maximum-dimension
component-parameters.helperText: The maximum dimension across the object

component-parameters.label: Percentage Cortical Coverage
component-parameters.name: cortical-coverage
component-parameters.helperText: Percentage of dorsal and platform surfaces combined covered in cortex

component-parameters.label: Number of Dorsal Scars
component-parameters.name: number-dorsal-scars
component-parameters.helperText: Only count scars >15 mm in maximum dimension

component-parameters.label: Flake Comments
component-parameters.name: flake-comments
component-parameters.helperText: Any additional comments about this flake

component-parameters.label: Site Name
component-parameters.name: site-name
component-parameters.helperText: Enter a name for this site

component-parameters.label: GPS Location
component-parameters.name: site-gps
component-parameters.helperText: Capture GPS location of this site

component-parameters.label: Materials Present
component-parameters.name: materials-present
component-parameters.helperText: Select all materials present at the site

component-parameters.label: Recommend for Further Investigation
component-parameters.name: recommend-investigation
component-parameters.helperText: Should this site be investigated further?

component-parameters.label: Notes
component-parameters.name: site-notes
component-parameters.helperText: Any additional notes about this site

metadata.name: CC Transect Survey
metadata.pre_description: Digital recording system for the Malawi Earlier-Middle Stone Age Project (MEMSAP) archaeological field survey. This notebook supports transect-based survey documentation with detailed lithic artifact analysis.

project.name: MEMSAP
project.description: The Malawi Earlier-Middle Stone Age Project is a cross-disciplinary project aimed at understanding changes in human technology, subsistence, and demography across the Middle Stone Age (ca. 280-30 thousand years ago).
